mapper.select: SELECT HISTORY_NO , POINT_CHANGE , REASON , CREATE_DATE FROM CP_POINT_HISTORY WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT POINT , USER_LEVEL AS userLevel FROM CP_POINT WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE CP_POINT SET POINT = POINT + #{point} WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND (POINT + #{point}) >= 0
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO AS userNo , REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo FROM CP_LIKE
SELECT USER_NO AS userNo , REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo FROM CP_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CP_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
